org.spongepowered.api.text

Class SelectorText.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.spongepowered.api.text.Text.Builder
      • org.spongepowered.api.text.SelectorText.Builder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TextElement, TextRepresentable
    Enclosing class:
    SelectorText

    public static class SelectorText.Builder
extends Text.Builder
    Represents a Text.Builder creating immutable SelectorText instances.
    See Also:
    SelectorText
